description: The business problem along with its scientific solution is focused around Fintech Industry which is erupting these days expect a lot of fun Refer this url for the full meduim article https medium. gusarova learn to build an end to end data science project for fintech part i e84bc542e92f Libraries Load Dataset Missing data Dealing with outliers Panda Profiling Categorcal features Ordinal transofmraiton One hot encoding Bi Variate Analysis sub_grade and loan_status annual_inc vs loan_status emp_length vs loan_status dti vs loan_status Train Test Split Save DataFrame in CSV file Logistic Regression Model This Python 3 environment comes with many helpful analytics libraries installed It is defined by the kaggle python Docker image https github. read_csv You can write up to 20GB to the current directory kaggle working that gets preserved as output when you create a version using Save Run All You can also write temporary files to kaggle temp but they won t be saved outside of the current session Pandas options linear algebra loansr is a raw dataset containing 2 million of rows remove outlier annual income plot a chart to view to what extend outliers are removed remove outlier remove outlier remove outlier remove outlier remove outlier dropping passed columns convert annual_inc to integer data type create a new DataFrame for our processed data. com kaggle docker python For example here s several helpful packages to load data processing CSV file I O e. IntroductionThis series of articles walks you through end to end process to build a data science project based on a real business problem.
